Author: radio_drewanne
Text: You're going to use a lot of muscles you aren't used to using (probably? Don't know what your life is like, but learning how to keep your balance on skis is quite a journey) and you'll probably burn a lot of calories. That being said, it can wipe you out really quick if you aren't fueled for it. Your body might also be working extra hard to keep you warm. Be really careful about staying hydrated and eating, being on a mountain is no fun if you feel like you're going to pass out half the time xx
